repairedDockerfile:
FROM dylanlindgren/docker-phpcli:latest

MAINTAINER "Dylan Lindgren" <dylan.lindgren@gmail.com>

WORKDIR /tmp

RUN apt-get update -y && \
    apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
    php5-mcrypt \
    php5-mongo \
    php5-mssql \
    php5-mysqlnd \
    php5-pgsql \
    php5-redis \
    php5-sqlite \
    imagemagick \
    php5-imagick \
    php5-gd && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN mkdir -p /data/www
VOLUME ["/data"]
WORKDIR /data/www

ENTRYPOINT ["php", "artisan"]
CMD ["--help"]
